messages.title: Helping you / Yn helpu chi
messages.content: Fairness for ASW Workers/ Tegwch I Weithwyr ASW I fought for ASW workers who lost their pensions. I secured compensation for the Cardiff steelworkers, helping them to recover almost £8m in pensions. Bûm yn ymladd dros weithwyr ASW a oedd wedi colli eu pensiynau. Sicrhau i weithwyr dur Caerdydd yn ASW a oedd wedi colli eu pensiynau.

messages.title: Protection for Consumers/ Amddiffyniad i Ddefnyddwyr
messages.content: As Consumer Minister I've tackled the problem of loan sharks and rip-off credit card practices. Fel Gweinidog dros Ddefnyddwyr rwyf wedi mynd i'r afael â'r problem benthycwyr diwygieddor ac arferion cardiau credyd annheg.

messages.title: Protecting our environment/ Amddiffyn ein hamgylchedd
messages.content: I campaigned successfully against a new landfill site in Cardiff West. Ymgyrchu'n llwyddiannus yn erbyn safle tirlenwi newydd yng Ngorllewin Caerdydd.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Cardiff West and care passionately about our area. Campaigning for jobs, fighting anti-social behaviour and working for better public services - I always put local people first.

leaflet.additionalNotes: I will / Byddaf i'n - Continue to fight for a fair deal for all our pensioners./ Parhau i ymladd i sicrhau bargen deg i'n holl bensiynwyr. - Campaign to protect high quality public services - including our police, NHS and schools./ Ymgyrchu i amddiffyn gwasanaethau cyhoeddus o safon uchel - gan gynnwys ein heddlu, y GIG ac ysgolion. - Carry on working hard for you as a listening, campaigning MP!/ Dal ati i weithio'n galed drosoch chi fel AS sy'n gwrando ac yn ymgyrchu.
